hero.title: Translate, Preserve, and Connect
hero.subtitle: Translate and preserve endangered languages anywhere, even offline.

features.title: Designed for Remote Translation
features.subtitle: LangQuest makes translation possible even in the most challenging environments.

offline.title: Offline Tolerance
offline.description: Work without internet for extended periods. Your data is safely stored locally until you can sync.

ai.title: AI-Assisted Translation
ai.description: Use AI to generate initial translations, which users can review and vote on, speeding up the process.

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Features like leaderboards and rewards make translation fun and encourage participation.

openData.title: Open Data
openData.description: All validated translations become part of an openly licensed database, helping train future AI models.

howItWorks.title: How LangQuest Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Organize translations into projects, quests, and assets for efficient management.

projects.title: Create Projects
projects.description: Organize your translation work into projects, like translating the Bible or important cultural texts.

collaborate.title: Collaborate
collaborate.description: Invite community members to contribute translations and vote on each other's work.

validate.title: Validate & Share
validate.description: Validate translations through community voting and share them with the world.

useCases.title: Perfect For
useCases.subtitle: LangQuest is designed for a variety of translation needs.

future.title: Future: Peer-to-Peer Connectivity
future.subtitle: We're actively researching solutions to enable direct device-to-device sharing of translation data without internet.

features.share: Share updates between devices when team members meet
features.sync: Sync progress across multiple devices without internet
features.collaborate: Enable true collaboration in the most remote locations

cta.title: Join the LangQuest Community
cta.subtitle: Be among the first to use LangQuest and help preserve low-resource languages.
cta.notification: We'll notify you when LangQuest is ready for beta testing.
